RotaryColorScale Properties

Requires: Base Development System

Inherits from Generic»GObject»Scale»ColorScale. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Scale PositionSpecifies the position of the rotary scale. This property is not writable for meters. Details
Scale Position:RangeSpecifies the clockwise range, in radians, of the scale from the start position. This property is not writable for meters. Details
Scale Position:StartSpecifies where the scale begins. The 3 o'clock position is 0, 12 o'clock position is pi/2, 9 0'clock position is pi, 6 o'clock position is 3*pi/2, and so on. This property is not writable for meters. Details
